login.why-register: Почему я должен регистрироваться? Нам нужен адрес Вашей электронной почты для того, чтобы отправить Вам отредактированный текст.

main.heading: Editing your text is now very easy
main.description: Just 3 steps and your text will be brought to perfection by professional editors = native speakers - 200 rubles per page, within 24 hours

step1.copy-paste: Copy and paste your text here
step1.find-out-cost: Find out the cost and pay online
step1.get-email: Get the text sent to your e-mail address

step2.errors-description: (Analysis of mistakes - is a detailed error analysis - grammatical, stylistic and spelling, you could make in your text. You will receive a detailed description of the explanation as to why certain parts of your text should be corrected)
step2.pay-by-kiwi: Via kiwi-purse, or in any payment kiosk.

step3.information: The edited text will be emailed to you within 24 hours.
step3.feedback: We also would appreciate your feedback and comments
